headline.main: AFFAIRS IN HAVANA.; Soldier Killed on Military Parade--Desperate right on board a Schooner--Business, &c.c.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have had some military performance in the past week given to illustrate our advance in the noble art and science of war. On the 17th, Gen. ANDRA ordered a regular training, and a military "break-down" in the old-fashioned "sham fight" order--the volunteers for the sport, arrayed in opposition to the Queen's soldiers, whom they were to conquer--and they did it most gallantly, led on by the brave Colonel Commandant Jose MARIA MORALES.
